stdout:
Table	Create Table
interview_feedback	CREATE TABLE `interview_feedback` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `interviewId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `candidateId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `overallRating` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `interviewerRating` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `processRating` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `communicationRating` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `positiveAspects` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `areasForImprovement` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `additionalComments` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `wouldRecommend` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,
  `isAnonymous` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `fk_1` (`interviewId`),
  KEY `fk_2` (`candidateId`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`interviewId`) REFERENCES `myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA`.`interviews` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`candidateId`) REFERENCES `myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA`.`candidates` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
